response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. I am offering you the chance to acquire a unique product that holds significant value to me. This product is not just an item; it's an investment in excellence and functionality. Given its importance to me, I believe its true worth lies beyond the monetary value, making it a priceless asset for those who appreciate its qualities.

Considering your keen interest and potential use for this product, I am extending a special offer to you. I propose a purchase price of $1,200,000. This amount reflects a fair compromise between my attachment to the product and its perceived value to you. It allows me to recoup a substantial portion of its worth while providing you with an exceptional deal.

Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I am confident that this product will serve you well and bring you the satisfaction it has offered to me.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
